title: Do you think teens spent too much time on devices and other technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of my nieces and one of my nephews, one niece loves to be outside. So 2/3 of my teen family members. From what I can tell it seems as though generally yes, but then again I observe teens using them during times when generations past would be twiddling their thumbs and bored as can be. So in my family yes, but better answered by a teacher or parent closely observing teens.
